info.title: PBL API
info.description: API for News Project PBL Politeknik Negeri Bali 2024

get.summary: Get the latest news and category segments

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit the number of latest news items (default: 5)

parameters.name: limitPaginate
parameters.description: Limit the number of paginated news items per page (default: 25)

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: Category slug to filter news by category

items.example: The limit and page parameters must be positive integers.
The limit parameter must be a positive integer.

get.description: Fetch a list of news based on search criteria with pagination.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number for paginated results (default is 1).

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Keyword to search by title, description, or tags.

description.example: This is the description of the news.

items.example: The limit, limit, and page parameters must be positive integers.

get.summary: Retrieve a single news item by its ID
get.description: Fetch a news item along with related news based on its title

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the news item to fetch

news.description: Details of the requested news item

description.example: A major event has taken place, drawing global attention.

title.example: Related News: Updates on the Major Event

description.example: Further updates on the major event are now available.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit the number of news items

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of news items per page (default: 10)

title.example: Ogoh ogoh denpasar 2025 keren dan super detail
